name: URLResponse
desc: The metadata associated with the response to a URL load request, independent of protocol and URL scheme.

items.name: init(url: URL, mimeType: String?, expectedContentLength: Int, textEncodingName: String?)
items.desc: Creates an initialized URLResponse object with the URL, MIME type, length, and text encoding set to given values.

items.name: var expectedContentLength: Int64
items.desc: The expected length of the response’s content.

items.name: var suggestedFilename: String?
items.desc: A suggested filename for the response data.

items.name: var mimeType: String?
items.desc: The MIME type of the response.

items.name: var textEncodingName: String?
items.desc: The name of the text encoding provided by the response’s originating source.
